summary: A widow sends her only son away to receive a better education. Years later, she visits him, finding him a poor school teacher with a wife and son.
cast: Chôko Iida|Shin'ichi Himori|Masao Hayama|Yoshiko Tsubouchi|Mitsuko Yoshikawa|Chishû Ryû|Tomoko Naniwa|Kiyoshi Aono|Jun Yokoyama|Eiko Takamatsu|Seiichi Katô|Tomio Aoki
title: El hijo único
